collections.title: Barbara Walker - Contemporary Portraits
collections.description: A collection of Barbara Walker's powerful portraits exploring themes of gender, race, representation, and power.

collections.title: Charmaine Watkiss - Mythological Drawings
collections.description: A collection of Charmaine Watkiss's intricate drawings exploring themes of ritual, tradition, ancestry, and mythology.

collections.title: Duncan Grant - Bloomsbury Group Archive
collections.description: A comprehensive collection of Duncan Grant's works, including those featured in Dior's Summer 2023 menswear collection.

collections.title: Tom Hammick - Mythological Worlds
collections.description: A collection of Tom Hammick's vibrant works featuring mythological worlds, as seen in FOLK's 2023 winter collection.

collections.title: Sidney Nolan - Antarctica Series
collections.description: A unique collection of Sidney Nolan's Antarctica series, featured in Australian Post's commemorative stamp set.
